channel.title: RSCD v25 www files problem + admin rights
channel.description:
1. How do i set admin rights to myself for RSCD using mysql or what must be configured, or make someone player moderator? All the rights, if someone knows. Please let me know, if you want to share. :) The files that need to be edited is enough, i can figure out other things, the source is sorta different from rs2, so it's new for me. Thanks in return. 2.Solved Hello, i have registered to this server, learned much and i appreciate it all, that you do here. But now i have come to a question. I really hope you can help me out, i know some html, css and javascript but i am stuck at the point where: [code] PiruOnline / Redirecting

Redirecting

Logged out. Redirecting …

Click here if you do not want to wait any longer (or if your browser does not automatically forward you)

[/code] at the point where is the IP: 216.245.211.162 , have been searching through the files, tracking it's source, but i just havent found it, if anyone know's where the source of this file is, then can you give me hints or something? Thanks. More data: This is the page where you insert your user, pass and then will come the Redirect page, after that it just wants to redirect me to 216.245.211.162/index.php, but that's not my IP so it ends up at my speedtouch. Sorry if it is much to ask for a newcomer. Just don't reply if you think i am too low for getting help..

item.description:
@anc13nts1 wrote:

[quote=“krth, post:5, topic:234511”]Bump, i am still in trouble with the privilege settings, i still don’t know how to set admin/moderator privileges in gameserver and webserver.

I would appreciate it very much if someone would’ve help me out. :)[/quote]

users - in datebase group id = 1 = admin

RSCD_Players = id = 1 = admin

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @krth krth
item.description:
@krth wrote:

Thank you for reply, but that didn’t help me at all, as i explained, i need to find the file’s source, that’s in the “code”, i have managed to get the file’s data from stopping the redirect page, and view source, then copied it down, but i don’t know where’s the file in my htdocs folder, so i could change it.

I am trying to find the file, so i could change it.

Thanks in return.

I have investigated my htdocs folder for hours now, still not a clue.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD v25 www files problem + admin rights
item.dc:creator: @krth krth
item.description:
@krth wrote:

How do i set admin rights to myself for RSCD using mysql or what must be configured, or make someone player moderator? All the rights, if someone knows. Please let me know, if you want to share. The files that need to be edited is enough, i can figure out other things, the source is sorta different from rs2, so it’s new for me.

Thanks in return.

2.Solved

Hello, i have registered to this server, learned much and i appreciate it all, that you do here. But now i have come to a question. I really hope you can help me out, i know some html, css and javascript but i am stuck at the point where:

[code]

PiruOnline / Redirecting

Redirecting

<div class="box">
	<div class="inbox">
		<p>Logged out. Redirecting …<br /><br /><a href="http://216.245.211.162/index.php">Click here if you do not want to wait any longer (or if your browser does not automatically forward you)</a></p>
	</div>
</div>
[/code]

at the point where is the IP: 216.245.211.162 , have been searching through the files, tracking it’s source, but i just havent found it, if anyone know’s where the source of this file is, then can you give me hints or something? Thanks.

More data: This is the page where you insert your user, pass and then will come the Redirect page, after that it just wants to redirect me to 216.245.211.162/index.php, but that’s not my IP so it ends up at my speedtouch. Sorry if it is much to ask for a newcomer. Just don’t reply if you think i am too low for getting help…

Read full topic
